Posts.Content: Nursepatient35 wrote: I'm going to be having a double mastectomy with nipple sparing reconstruction soon. I work as a surgery/outpatient nurse but have no experience with this kind of surgery. What can I expect for recovery? Do I need 6 weeks off? More? What is the typical lifting restrictions? My job requires some lifting of patients, pushing carts, carrying heavy trays, etc. Will I be able to go back to work full time as soon as I can lift? Any info would be appreciated.
